forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
The dawn of this day in Downtown San Francisco greets us with azure skies and a quiet serenity that beckons to those who revel in the simple pleasures of a cool, bright morning. The sun casts its gentle rays across the cityscape, illuminating the iconic structures as they stand resolute against the backdrop of distant hills. While the temperature starts at a crisp 65, it will gracefully descend to around 58, making it a day rich with the promise of mildness, allowing one to wander comfortably through the streets.

As evening draws near, the sky will transition to a calming clarity, with temperatures falling to a cool 46, softly rising again overnight. With winds drifting from the north at a gentle speed, there’s a pleasant stillness in the air that suggests a welcome calmness. The absence of fog—typically so prevalent in this vibrant area—makes for a rare opportunity to savor panoramic views, perhaps while enjoying a quiet stroll along the Embarcadero or indulging in a warm beverage at a cozy café as the city begins to wind down. Today invites a simple outing; a chance to appreciate the subtle beauty that unfolds before us as the golden hour approaches, painting the city in hues of warmth, before night softly envelops it.
